game.name: Cattlieb
game.shortDescription: Pinball meets roguelike. A mysterious adventure of strategy and luck, where the path of the ball changes the battle and board events with both risks and rewards shake the player’s choices.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Pinball meets roguelike. A mysterious adventure of strategy and luck, where the path of the ball changes the battle and board events with both risks and rewards shake the player’s choices.
